casebody.data:
Sergeant First Class Frank CHIOFALO, a Member of the New Jersey State Police (Badge No. 4772), Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STATE of New Jersey, Division of State Police of the State of New Jersey, and Division of Law and Public Safety, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Robert Cuomo and Joseph R. Fuentes, Defendants. C-288 September Term 2018
081607 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 17, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002349-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
